marytts.modules
Class DummyFreeTTSVoice

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.speech.freetts.Voice
      marytts.modules.DummyFreeTTSVoice
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.speech.freetts.Dumpable, com.sun.speech.freetts.UtteranceProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DummyFreeTTSVoice
public class DummyFreeTTSVoice
extends com.sun.speech.freetts.Voice

Defines a dummy voice allowing to use FreeTTS UtteranceProcessors from "outside". Differing from the FreeTTS philosophy, this "voice" does *not* actually call the UtteranceProcessors. It only serves as a collection of data, such as the lexicon, and some reference values.

Constructor Detail

DummyFreeTTSVoice

public DummyFreeTTSVoice(java.util.Locale locale)
Creates a simple voice containing a reference to a marytts.modules.synthesis.Voice. This default constructor must be followed by a meaningful call to initialise().

DummyFreeTTSVoice

public DummyFreeTTSVoice(Voice maryVoice,
                         java.lang.String lexiconClassName)
Creates a simple voice containing a reference to a marytts.modules.synthesis.Voice.

Parameters:
lexiconClassName - if not null, automatically load up the specified lexicon; otherwise, don't load any lexicon.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if the class specified by lexiconClassName cannot be instantiated.

loader

protected void loader()
Called by load() during loading, derived voices should override this to provide customized loading.

Specified by:
loader in class com.sun.speech.freetts.Voice

allocate

public void allocate()
Loads this Voice. It loads the lexicon and the audio output handler, but does not create audio output and output thread. It then calls the loader() method to load Voice-specific data, which include utterance processors.

Overrides:
allocate in class com.sun.speech.freetts.Voice
